mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_quarter FROM def_goods g,def_corp cp,def_brand db WHERE g.corp_code=cp.corp_code AND g.corp_code=db.corp_code AND g.brand_code=db.brand_code AND g.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND g.isactive = 'Y' AND cp.isactive = 'Y' AND db.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY g.goods_quarter

SELECT g.goods_wave FROM def_goods g,def_corp cp,def_brand db WHERE g.corp_code=cp.corp_code AND g.corp_code=db.corp_code AND g.brand_code=db.brand_code AND g.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND g.isactive = 'Y' AND cp.isactive = 'Y' AND db.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY g.goods_wave

SELECT dg.goods_code, dg.goods_name, dg.goods_image FROM def_goods dg WHERE 1=1
AND dg.corp_code=#{corp_code}
AND (dg.goods_code LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR dg.goods_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
AND dg.isactive='Y'
